title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 September 2016 - XWiki
content:

09:25 <vmassol> :)  
09:26 <vmassol> I was going to say sorry for my spam but tmortagne is beating me to it :)  
09:26 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks like we have a big issue with save&continue in 8.2.1...  
09:29 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki

09:31 <tmortagne> Start 7.4.5 release

09:46 <Inge-> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <vmassol> mflorea: I see you're changing playground  
10:04 <vmassol> let me rephrase  
10:04 <vmassol> mflorea: if you're changing playground it's not going to be enough  
10:04 <vmassol> since it's reset every day from a SQL dump  
10:05 <mflorea> vmassol: how do we update the SQL dump?  
10:06 <vmassol> depends if there are changes on playground, checking  
10:06 <vmassol> yes there are  
10:06 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks at the end of http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Migrations/#HUpgradeXWiki  
10:07 <tmortagne> mflorea:  
10:07 <vmassol> so the process is step 7 of http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Migrations/  
10:08 <mflorea> ok, I'll do that

16:39 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:42 <edvorg> has quit  
16:43 <msmeria> has quit  
16:44 <Trefex\_> hi guys, i created a new space with a dashboard, and the user does not have rights to execute macro  
16:45 <Trefex\_> now it says failed to execute the velocity macro even when i save as admin over it  
16:45 <Trefex\_> is there anything i can do to fix this ?  
16:49 <vmassol> Trefex\_: what error do you get?  
16:49 <Trefex\_> vmassol: was a permission error, even when just clicking edit and saving, it doesn't work  
16:49 <vmassol> yes but what error?  
16:49 <Trefex\_> i had to add a whitespace, save, edit, remove whitespace, then it took into account "last author" permissions  
16:49 <vmassol> can you paste the error?  
16:49 <Trefex\_> vmassol: oups, now it's gone  
16:50 <vmassol> it's either PR or SR  
16:50 <vmassol> SR = sript right  
16:50 <vmassol> \*sdcript  
16:50 <vmassol> PR = programming right  
16:50 <vmassol> you should check the permissions to see if the script right is set for the user/group your user is in  
16:52 <Trefex\_> vmassol: it's not, but even when i edit as admin which has the rights, it didn't reflect this  
16:52 <Trefex\_> can you try following ?  
16:52 <Trefex\_> create a dashboard with normal user, will receive error  
16:53 <Trefex\_> then edit as admin, and save, it will say last modified by "admin"  
16:53 <Trefex\_> yet error remains  
16:53 <Trefex\_> to get rid of the error, i have to edit in "text mode" and add a space or something  
16:56 <vmassol> ok I see  
16:56 <vmassol> WDYM by "create dashboard"?  
16:56 <vmassol> what I think happens is this:  
16:56 <vmassol> you have a subwiki and a user that doesn't have script rigths  
16:57 <vmassol> somewhere in the UI (whrre?) you click on a button that generates a new page and saves it with that user as the autho  
16:57 <vmassol> since that author doiesn't have SR, it fails  
16:57 <vmassol> you then need to save the page with a user having SR to make it work  
17:02 <acotiuga> has quit  
17:09 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
17:26 <Pbas> hi, a quick question: with xwiki 8.2.1 we have some predefined template: blog post, dashboard and default one: blank page. Can I modify this one? Add a new template and make it default? http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Features/Forms/CreatingPageUsingTemplate.png  
17:29 <Aison> has quit  
17:29 <mflorea> has quit  
17:29 <vmassol> Pbas: good question :)  
17:30 <vmassol> I don't think the feature exists from the UI  
17:30 <vmassol> but it would be a good idea to have the ability to make a template the default  
17:30 <vmassol> (you could open a jira)  
17:30 <vmassol> now  
17:30 <vmassol> maybe it's possible to hack it  
17:31 <Pbas> I didn't found "blank page" template.  
17:31 <vmassol> it's not a template  
17:31 <Pbas> yes I was affraid you answer that  
17:32 <vmassol> you should check createinline.vm  
17:32 <vmassol> sorry I don't have the time to check it out ATM  
17:32 <Pbas> of course I already modified this one  
17:32 <Pbas> createinline.vm on 7.0.1  
17:33 <Pbas> thxs  
17:33 <Pbas> np you help me  
17:37 <evalica> has quit  
17:40 <Trefex\_> vmassol: yep only it doesn't work, when i create a new page, i can create based on a "Dashboard" template or something  
17:40 <Enygma`1> has quit  
17:40 <Trefex\_> that will create a page with 3 gadgets  
17:56 <vmassol> Trefex\_: ok I understand the use case now  
17:56 <vmassol> so this is what I was saying  
17:57 <vmassol> so you just need to give script permissions to XwikiAllGroup  
17:57 <vmassol> see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13729
